Ifeanyi Chukwuma Odii (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1975) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Orient Global Group

yana onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke People’s Democratic Party maka Ebonyi Steeti na ntuli aka gọvanọ nke afọ 2023. Odii bụ nwa afọ Isu na mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Onicha (LGA) nke steeti Ebonyi, Naijiria.
Odii gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Isu-achara na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Isu, ha abụọ di na steeti Ebonyi maka agụmakwụkwọ ya
Odii gụrụ Business Administration na National Open University of Nigeria na-enweta nzere Bachelọ nke Sayensị (B.Sc.)

Enyere ya Dọkịta nke Sayensị Degree na Strategic Business Management & Corporate Governance site na European American University na Republic of Panama. Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ site na Chief Executive program na Lagos Business School
Ọ bụ onye otu Lagos State University Governing board ekwupụtara n'afọ 2021 site n'aka Gọvanọ Lagos State, Babajide Sanwo-Olu Ọ nọkwa na bọọdụ nke Nnamdi Azikwe University Business School.

A họpụtara Odii n'afọ 2023 ka ọ bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke People’s Democratic Party (Nigeria) na ntụli aka o jiri narị atọ na iri anọ na itoolu merie onye iro ya kacha nso, Chris Usulor, onye nwetara votu itoolu.
Odii haziri Ebele na Anyichuks Foundation nke ya na nwunye ya na-elekọta

Ntọala ahụ arụgoro ihe karịrị ụlọ otu narị na iri atọ maka ndị ogbenye, ụlọ ụka isii na okporo ụzọ 2.2 km (1.4 ) na Magodo, Lagos. N'oge ọrịa COVID-19, ntọala ahụ nyekwara otu narị nde na iri ise naira na Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa, Gọọmentị steeti Lagos na Gọọmenti steeti Ebonyi yana ikesa ihe nrite nye ndị mmadụ. O nyekwara ụmụ akwụkwọ na steeti Ebonyi agụmakwụkwọ n'efu
